mod.chiselsandbits.chisel.support.not.su: 鑿：不支持-相容性已停用
鑿：不支持-有自定義碰撞
鑿：不支持-具有自定義放置
鑿：不支持-分析失敗。檢查日誌！
鑿：不支持-通過標籤強制
mod.chiselsandbits.result.missing_bits: 碎屑不夠或鑿的耐久過低！
mod.chiselsandbits.result.require_bag: 你在使用這個物品前需要在物品欄或背包裡留空一個槽！
mod.chiselsandbits.result.void_excess: 你的物品欄已滿，任何多餘的碎屑都不會產出！
mod.chiselsandbits.help.chiseled_block: {} 以放置雕塑；{} 以忽略方塊網格；游標滾輪可以循環改變放置朝向。
mod.chiselsandbits.help.bit_bag: 自動存放和補充雕刻碎屑。
mod.chiselsandbits.help.bit: {} 以進行雕刻；{} 以放置；使用 {} 鍵打開選單。
mod.chiselsandbits.help.positiveprint: {} 以寫入圖紙；之後 {} 可以直接雕刻或放置雕塑，也可以同碎屑或碎屑袋一起進行合成；游標滾輪可以循環改變放置朝向；使用 {} 鍵打開選單.
mod.chiselsandbits.help.negativeprint: {} 以寫入圖紙； {} 可以直接雕刻或放置雕塑；游標滾輪可以循環改變放置朝向。
mod.chiselsandbits.help.mirrorprint: {} 想要鏡像的雕塑方塊以寫入圖紙；和正型/負型雕塑圖紙一起合成來傳遞圖案。
mod.chiselsandbits.help.chisel: {} 以進行雕刻；使用 {} 鍵打開選單。
mod.chiselsandbits.help.bitsaw: 和方塊或雕塑進行合成；可沿三個軸的任一方向切開。
mod.chiselsandbits.help.bittank.empty: 裝入流體，提取碎屑;目前為空。
mod.chiselsandbits.help.bittank.full: 裝入流體，提取碎屑;包含: {}.; {} 剩餘空位。
mod.chiselsandbits.help.tape_measure: 按住 {} 並拖拽以測量；{} + {} 可清除之前的測繪；使用 {} 鍵打開選單。
mod.chiselsandbits.help.magnifying_glass: 鼠標懸停在塊上以檢查是否相容。
mod.chiselsandbits.help.chiseled_block.l: 左擊以放置雕塑；潛行時會忽略方塊網格。Shift+游標滾輪可以循環改變放置朝向。
mod.chiselsandbits.help.bit_bag.long: 自動存放和補充雕刻碎屑：物品欄內碎屑多餘一組的部分將被儲存,少於一組的部分將被自動補充到一組。\n\n和任意染料合成進行著色。
mod.chiselsandbits.help.wrench.long: 右擊方塊時將會以你右擊的麵為軸旋轉該方塊。
mod.chiselsandbits.help.tape_measure.lon: 按住左鍵並拖拽以測量空間。潛行右鍵可以清除之前所有創建的繪製。在選單中可以切換不同的測繪模式。
mod.chiselsandbits.help.magnifying_glass: This item allows for the analysis of blocks in the world. It allows you by hovering over a block to see, why a block is supported by Chisels and Bits or why not.
mod.chiselsandbits.help.bit.long: 左擊以雕刻方塊中標示的區域。右擊以在目標區域放置。
mod.chiselsandbits.help.positiveprint.lo: 右擊一個雕塑方塊以寫入圖紙。之後右擊方塊時將會按照圖紙添加碎屑並移除不匹配圖紙的部分。你也可以在工作台中將圖紙和碎屑或碎屑袋一起合成。使用 Shift+滑鼠滾輪 可以無移動地循環旋轉其朝向。
mod.chiselsandbits.help.negativeprint.lo: 右擊一個雕塑方塊以寫入圖紙。之後右擊方塊時將會移除方塊不在負型圖紙中的部分。使用 Shift+滑鼠滾輪 可以無移動地循環旋轉其朝向。
mod.chiselsandbits.help.mirrorprint.long: 右擊你想要鏡像的雕塑方塊以寫入圖紙，如果右擊的是東面，則會沿著東->西軸鏡像該圖案。和正型/負型雕塑圖紙一起合成以傳遞鏡像後的圖案到你所選擇的圖紙上。
mod.chiselsandbits.help.chisel.long: 左擊任何相容的方塊來雕刻。右擊可以循環改變雕刻模式，你也可以使用 Shift+滑鼠滾輪 來循環改變模式。.
mod.chiselsandbits.help.bitsaw.long: 將這把鋸子和其所支持的方塊或對稱的雕塑一起合成，可以將它們切成兩半。合成中鋸子和方塊的位置關係決定了將會沿哪個軸切開，鋸子放在方塊左右兩側將會沿X軸切開方塊，放在上下兩側則會沿Y軸切開，放在對角兩側則會沿Z軸切開。
mod.chiselsandbits.help.bittank.long: 用桶右擊它可以加入或從中移除液體。不持有桶的時候右擊將會從裝入液體的儲罐中提取碎屑。 Shift+右鍵將會向其填入玩家手上的碎屑，空手這樣填入時將會填入盡可能多的碎屑。你可以使用漏斗之類的物品從裝有液體的儲罐中自動提取碎屑。
mod.chiselsandbits.help.trash: 刪除袋中碎屑，可將物品拖過來過濾。
mod.chiselsandbits.help.reallytrash: 再次點擊以確認清空袋中所有碎屑
mod.chiselsandbits.help.reallytrash_blan: 再次點擊以確認刪除所有%s
commands.setbit.outOfWorld: 無法在世界外放置方塊
commands.setbit.spaceOccupied: 空間已被佔據，無法放置碎屑
mod.chiselsandbits.config.persistCreativ: 保存/讀取創造剪貼板內容
mod.chiselsandbits.config.addBrokenBlock: 破壞雕塑時自動保存至創造剪貼板
mod.chiselsandbits.config.creativeClipbo: 創造剪貼板存放物品的最大數量，超過該值後之前存放的內容將被覆蓋，設定為0將會停用剪貼板。
mod.chiselsandbits.config.showUsage: 為物品描述添加提示性文字
mod.chiselsandbits.config.enableChiselMo: 啟用模式 - 連接板狀
啟用模式 - 連接材質
啟用模式 - 相同材質
啟用模式 - 繪製區域
啟用模式 - 捕獲1/8大小的方塊
啟用模式 - 捕獲1/4大小的方塊
啟用模式 - 捕獲1/2大小的方塊
mod.chiselsandbits.config.enablePositive: 啟用模式 - 部分替換
啟用模式 - 完全替換
mod.chiselsandbits.config.enableToolbarI: 在工具欄中顯示模式圖標
mod.chiselsandbits.config.perChiselMode: 儲存每個鑿所選擇的模式
mod.chiselsandbits.config.chatModeNotifi: 用聊天訊息提示模式改變
mod.chiselsandbits.config.itemNameModeDi: 用工具欄上方高亮訊息提示模式改變
mod.chiselsandbits.config.dynamicModelFa: 比這個更加複雜的模型將會使用動態渲染。
mod.chiselsandbits.config.dynamicModelRa: 在這個範圍外的動態渲染方塊將不會被渲染。
mod.chiselsandbits.config.dynamicModelMi: 停用這個將會犧牲反應能力而提高效能。
mod.chiselsandbits.config.dynamicMaxConc: 同時發生更新的最大數量
當超過這個數字後，更新將會暫停以防內存飽和。
mod.chiselsandbits.config.enablePositive: 和正型雕塑圖紙一起合成
開啟後如果將正型圖紙和碎屑或碎屑袋一起合成將得到該方塊。
mod.chiselsandbits.config.enableStackabl: 通過合成清除雕塑方塊的旋轉
你可以利用這個特性移除掉旋轉從而堆疊相同樣式的方塊。
mod.chiselsandbits.config.enableNegative: 通過將已寫入的雕塑圖紙和空白圖紙一起合成。
mod.chiselsandbits.config.enableChiselTo: 檢查工具種類或鑿子的等級
你必須用鑽石鑿才能獲得黑曜石雕刻碎屑。
被鑿子模擬的工具種類
mod.chiselsandbits.config.enableToolHarv: 當破壞方塊時檢查工具等級
破壞黑曜石雕塑方塊時需要鑽石等級的工具。
mod.chiselsandbits.config.enableBitLight: 停用發光設定後,碎屑將僅僅只會熒光而方塊將不會提供任何亮度等級。
mod.chiselsandbits.config.bitLightPercen: 方塊發出最大亮度時碎屑所佔百分比
mod.chiselsandbits.config.bagStackSize: 碎屑袋 - 碎屑堆疊大小
mod.chiselsandbits.config.bagStackSize.t: 一組碎屑在袋中所能堆疊的大小：最小64，最大99,999
mod.chiselsandbits.config.logEligibility: 當計算 Eligibility 時記錄異常日誌
mod.chiselsandbits.config.enableModelCom: 壓縮內存中的頂點數據
mod.chiselsandbits.config.useGetLightVal: 使用「取得光照值」取得方塊的光照值。
mod.chiselsandbits.config.enableFaceLigh: 使用模型分析獲取光照數據。
mod.chiselsandbits.config.enableRightCli: 右擊時循環切換鑿的模式
mod.chiselsandbits.config.maxMillisecond: 每個方塊的最大毫秒數
上傳/循環的最大毫秒數
mod.chiselsandbits.config.maxTapeMeasure: 捲尺最大同時存在的測繪數量
mod.chiselsandbits.config.displayMeasuri: 在聊天欄中顯示捲尺的測量訊息
mod.chiselsandbits.config.defaultToDynam: 預設情況下 C&B 使用靜態渲染，並在區塊更新時使用動態渲染，這個設定相反：在確定了模型的細節後他才會恢復靜態渲染，有助於解決對於過度複雜的場景中使用靜態渲染的過度卡頓。
mod.chiselsandbits.config.forceDynamicRe: 測試模式，完全停用靜態渲染。
mod.chiselsandbits.config.useVBO.tooltip: 預設情況下，使用與MC相同的設置，但可以覆蓋。
mod.chiselsandbits.config.enableChiselCr: 在工作台中啟用鑿子雕刻塊
mod.chiselsandbits.config.dynamicRenderF: 動態渲染僅限完整方塊
防止將動態渲染的區塊細分為單個方塊。這增加了大多數常見情況（具有少數複雜方塊的區塊）的效能，但是在最壞的情況下（全是超級複雜的設計的區塊）降低了效能。
mod.chiselsandbits.config.requireBagSpac: 再使用鑿子前先需要背包或玩家的物品欄裡有空插槽。
mod.chiselsandbits.config.voidExcessBits: 將任何無法裝入背包或是物品欄裡的碎屑作廢。提高伺服器效能。在碎屑被作廢時撤消操作可能會出現問題。
mod.chiselsandbits.chisel.station.name: 雕刻站
mod.chiselsandbits.chisel.station.help: 允許批量生產單一材料的輪廓圖案。
mod.chiselsandbits.chisel.station.help.l: 允許您多次批量生產單個圖案。但是只允許使用一種材料，替換圖案中的任何現有材料。
mod.chiselsandbits.advancements.root.des: 讓自己鑿起來，開始潛入鑿子世界。
mod.chiselsandbits.advancements.find-chi: 放大鏡有助於發現世界。
mod.chiselsandbits.advancements.collect-: 這一堆小玩意總得有個去處。那麼這些碎屑袋可就派上用場了！
mod.chiselsandbits.advancements.make-tan: 使用位槽獲得流體鑿子。
mod.chiselsandbits.config.client.perform: 與效能相關的客戶端配置。
與碎屑儲存相關的客戶端效能配置。
與內容相關的位儲存客戶端效能配置。
與緩存相關的位儲存內容客戶端效能配置。
Determines the amount of models for the bit storage content, higher means more performance but also more memory usage.
The max hit box size of a chiselable region. Bigger requires more performance and more memory.
When enabled dynamic model generation extracts light map data from the models face data.
When enabled extracts the light emittance data from the block-state during dynamic model generation.
Vertex formats related client performance configuration.
Custom vertex formats related client performance configuration.
When enabled this prevents custom vertex formats from working.
mod.chiselsandbits.config.client.setting: 通知模式：聊天
啟用時，會在會談中通知您對範例工具模式進行的變更。
Clipboard: Store broken chiseled blocks
When enabled stores the data of broken chiseled blocks in your clipboard
工具模式更改：右鍵
啟用後，允許使用右鍵單擊（蹲下）通過鑿子的工具模式進行迴圈。
工具圖示：工具列
When enabled shows the tool mode of tools in the toolbar.
Bit-Bag Fullness: Inverted
When enabled changes the "damage"-bar indicator to be completely full when the bag is completely empty.
Tool-mode change: Display in item-name
When enabled shows the newly selected tool-mode in the item name.
Tool-mode: Individual per chisel
When enabled this gives each chisel its own chisel mode, instead of having a chisel mode globally.
Radial menu: Volume
The volume of the radial menu. Higher volume, makes the radial menu bigger.
Measurement mode: chat
When enabled notifies you of measured sizes, measured with the tape measured, in the chat.
Maximum amount of measurements
The maximum amount measurements stored before the oldest ones are removed.
Maximum amount of undo operations
The maximum amount of undo operations that are kept in memory. If more operations are added to the undo list, the oldest operations are removed from the list.
mod.chiselsandbits.config.common.help.en: Indicates if help tooltips are enabled or not.
mod.chiselsandbits.config.common.perform: The size of the collisions cache used to store VoxelShapes that determine collisions and hit positions. Higher value increases performance but also increases memory usage.
mod.chiselsandbits.config.server.balanci: When enabled does not perform bit operations on blocks when there is no space in bags or the players inventory to store the results.
When enabled voids the excess bits of bit operations on blocks when the excess bits of the operation that do not fit in the player inventory or his bags.
The amount of bits per stack in a slot in the bit bag. Increases or decreases the total amount of bits that can be stored in a single bag.
When enabled allows light emitting bits to act as light emitting blocks in world.
Maximum amount of light that a fully chiseled block can emit, in percentage from the maximum (100% is light-level 15).
When enabled performs checks if the chisel is allowed to harvest a given block.
A comma separated list of tool types that the chisel is allowed to imitate.
The amount of uses a diamond chisel has.
The amount of uses a stone chisel has.
The size of the creative clipboard.
啟用後，會強制所有在兼容性內產生錯誤的方塊都是可鑿的。
When enabled allows full blocks scanned with a positive print to be made from bits.
When enabled disables the chiselability of blocks which want to receive random ticks.
List of all block registry names, that are allowed to convert back into their normal block when chiseled but all bits are placed.
When enabled tools are damaged. When disabled tools are not damaged.
When enabled all tools are allowed to validate their harvest level on use, or return default values when disabled.
The amount of uses on the wrench.
mod.chiselsandbits.config.server.perform: When enabled performs fast lookups an reduces the memory overhead.
mod.chiselsandbits.config.server.trouble: When enabled logs errors that occur during compatibility analysis.
When enabled logs errors that happen when accessing tile entities.
mod.chiselsandbits.help.pattern.sealed: A sealed pattern. Created by applying a sealant on a simple pattern.;Can be used multiple times
mod.chiselsandbits.help.pattern.simple: A simple chiseled block pattern.;Can only be used once, but is modifiable.;Created by writing down the pattern with a quill while looking at a chiseled block.
mod.chiselsandbits.help.quill: The quill can be used to write down patterns.;Hold down right click while holding a piece of paper in your other hand when looking at a chiseled block.
mod.chiselsandbits.help.sealant: The sealant can be used to make simple patterns last.;Protecting the information written on them.;Hold right click while holding a simple pattern in your other hand to apply the seal.
mod.chiselsandbits.modification.table.he: Allows for modification of unsealed patterns.
Several different operations can be applied to an unsealed pattern. Additionally you can see a pattern modification before applying it.
mod.chiselsandbits.config.client.perform: Configuration entries related to the caches for models and their impact on performance.
The size of the model cache.
Configuration entries related to models and their impact on the performance.
mod.chiselsandbits.config.client.setting: Settings
Settings - Clipboard
Configuration entries related to the settings of the clipboard.
Configuration entries related to the settings of gameplay aspects.
Settings - Feature States
Configuration entries which can enable or disable certain gameplay aspects.
Settings - Feature States - Toolbar Icons
Configuration entries related to feature state of the toolbar icons on tools.
Settings - Radial
Configuration entries related to settings of the radial systems.
Settings - Radial - Menu
Configuration entries related to the settings of the radial menu.
Settings - Tape Measure
Configuration entries related to the settings of the tape measure.
Settings - Undo
Configuration entries related to the undo system.
mod.chiselsandbits.config.common.comment: Contains non-synced configuration entries used both in the client as well as in the server.
mod.chiselsandbits.config.common.help.co: Configuration entries related to the help system.
Common configuration entries related to the help system.
Common configuration entries related to the help system and how it is displayed.
Common configuration entries related to the help system and which features are enabled or not during displayment.
mod.chiselsandbits.pattern.placement.fai: Can not place pattern: It will collide with existing material!
Can not place pattern: No space for bits in your inventory or bags!
Can not place pattern: Not all bits are in your inventory or bags!
Can not place pattern: The targeted block is not solid!
Can not place pattern: The targeted block is not chiseled!
Can not place pattern: The targeted block is not empty!
Can not place pattern: The targeted block can not be chiseled!
You can not redo your last undo!
Cycle Tool mode to the left
Cycle Tool mode to the right
mod.chiselsandbits.help.unseal:
The sealant remover can be used to remove the seal from a sealed pattern.
This removes the protection from the pattern and will allow you to modify a pattern again.
The downside of this procedure is that the pattern becomes fragile and can then again only be used once.
Hold right click while holding a sealed pattern in your other hand to remove the seal.
mod.chiselsandbits.config.balancing.comm: Config options related to balancing the mod.
mod.chiselsandbits.config.balancing.bit-: The max size of the stacks of bits in the bit bag.
mod.chiselsandbits.config.balancing.blac: Disallow blocks which tick randomly from being chiseled.
mod.chiselsandbits.config.balancing.chan: The amount of changes that are being held in the change track.
mod.chiselsandbits.config.balancing.enab: Enables the compatibility mode of the chiselability checked.
mod.chiselsandbits.config.compat.comment: Configures options related to different compatibility modules.
mod.chiselsandbits.config.compat.jei.inj: Should C&B inject its bits into JEI?
mod.chiselsandbits.config.gui.radial-men: Should the mouse indicator be rendered?
mod.chiselsandbits.config.help.comment: Options for getting help in game.
mod.chiselsandbits.config.help.enabled-i: Should the help information be visible in tooltips?
mod.chiselsandbits.config.performance.ca: Size of the bit storage inner models cache.
Size of the model face cache.
Size of the block model cache.
Size of the collision box cache.
mod.chiselsandbits.config.performance.li: Should C&B pull lighting values from blockstates.
Should C&B pull lighting values from model faces.
mod.chiselsandbits.config.performance.mo: Options related to the building of the chiseled block models.
How many CPU threads should be used to build models?
mod.chiselsandbits.config.settings.bit-b: Should the durability bar display the emptiness of the bag instead of the fullness?
mod.chiselsandbits.config.settings.chise: Configures the chiseling and placement previews.
Configures the default chiseling and placement preview.
Configures the colors of the outlines that the chiseling and placement preview have.
The color for the chiseling preview outline.
The color for the placement preview outline.
Sets which preview renderer is in use. Currently C&B provides: `chiselsandbits:default` (Simple outline rendering) and `chiselsandbits:noop` (No preview) as options.
mod.chiselsandbits.config.settings.selec: Configures the tool mode icons used to render the selected tool modes of tools in the hot bar.
Sets which tool mode icon renderer is in use. Currently C&B provides: `chiselsandbits:group` (Render the group icon in the top right corner) and `chiselsandbits:noop` (No icon) as options.
mod.chiselsandbits.config.style.comment: Configures the different gameplay style options.
mod.chiselsandbits.config.style.bit-size: Configures the size of a single bit, relative to one block.
